full_description:
SG is a boutique technology company founded in 2004. We use technology and big data to solve real world financial puzzles. Our competitive advantage is a true meritocracy minimizing politics and rewarding results. The foundation of our culture is continuous improvement.
\n
We are seeking a Research Analyst. The ideal candidate will have an interest and basic understanding of financial markets and experience with python and big data analysis.
\n
Responsibilities:
\n
\n
Analyze market data that will impact trading strategies
\n
Support traders with quantitative research
\n
Analyze datasets
\n
Collaborate directly with traders to improve decision making with data backed solutions
\n
\n
Requirements:
\n
\n
Qualified candidates MUST have python and data analysis experience
\n
1-3 years of relevant analyst experience
\n
The ability to think quantitatively and communicate clearly
\n
The ability to multitask across projects, securities, and asset classes
\n
\n
What we offer:
\n
\n
Work-Life Balance - no excessive overtime
\n
Competitive market-based pay with results based rewards
\n
Solid benefit package including 401(k), medical, dental and vision
\n
Generous time off including holidays and vacation
\n
Education Reimbursement
\n
Freedom to solve technical challenges
\n
Fully stocked break room, weekly lunches, volunteer opportunities, and more!
\n
\n
Benefits:
\n
\n
401(k) matching
\n
Commuter assistance
\n
Dental insurance
\n
Health insurance
\n
Paid parental leave
\n
Paid time off
\n
Tuition reimbursement
\n
Vision insurance
\n
\n
Work Location: In person
